channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite

item.title: CVE-2020-5360|2024-08-04T08:30:23.769Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions prior to 4.5, are vulnerable to a Buffer Under-Read Vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability resulting in undefined behaviour, or a crash of the affected systems.

item.title: CVE-2020-5359|2024-08-04T08:30:23.780Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions prior to 4.5, are vulnerable to an Unchecked Return Value Vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to modify and corrupt the encrypted data.

item.title: CVE-2020-26184|2024-08-04T15:49:07.204Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions prior to 4.5.1, contain an Improper Certificate Validation vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-29508|2024-08-04T16:55:10.286Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Crypto-C Micro Edition, versions before 4.1.5, and Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions before 4.6, contain an Improper Input Validation Vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-26185|2024-08-04T15:49:07.135Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions prior to 4.5.1, contain a Buffer Over-Read Vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-28074|2024-08-01T17:46:14.672Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Crypto-C Micro Edition 4.1.5 and Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions 4.0 through 4.6.1 and version 5.0 contain a buffer over-read vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-28074|2024-07-31T07:56:01.652Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Crypto-C Micro Edition 4.1.5 and Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions 4.0 through 4.6.1 and version 5.0 contain a buffer over-read vulnerability.
